title: Patriots add former Texans pass-rusher to practice squad ahead of divisional matchup
author: Khari A. Thompson
bullets: New England Patriots Taylor had 9.
5 sacks in 2022, but he was waived by Houston this week.

Darrell Taylor AP Photo/Terrance Williams The Patriots signed former Texans defensive end Darrell Taylor to the practice squad on Wednesday, four days before hosting Houston in the divisional round, according to NFL Media’s Ian Rapoport.

title: ‘It’s not enough’: MLB insider slams Red Sox’ offseason approach amid A.L. East competition
author: Hayden Bird
bullets: Morning Sports Update "The Red Sox need to do one of two things: win more or bid higher.
" Alex Bregman during a Red Sox game in 2025.

Stan Grossfeld/Globe staff photo By Hayden Bird January 14, 2026 | 10:51 AM 3 minutes to read The latest on the Red Sox: Following the recent news that infielder Alex Bregman was leaving the Red Sox in free agency to sign a reported five-year deal with the Cubs worth $175 million, Boston fans (and even former players) have voiced their displeasure with the lack of aggression from the team’s front office.

title: Time Out Market will reportedly close this month
author: Katelyn Umholtz
bullets: Restaurants The food hall hosted 15 vendors that served everything from chicken sandwiches and pizza to donuts and lattes.
Time Out Market, a major food hall in Fenway, is set to close this month.
David L Ryan/Globe Staff By Katelyn Umholtz updated on January 14, 2026 | 12:15 PM 2 minutes to read ShareSend this article to your social connections.

title: Federal prosecutor apologizes for Babson student’s deportation in violation of court order
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News The 19-year-old was attempting to fly to Texas to surprise family for Thanksgiving.
